trans-unit.source: Represents a callout annotation.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en merknad for bildeforklaringslinje.

trans-unit.source: A callout annotation is the only annotation that draws a connection between the annotation position and the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: En bildeforklaring merknaden er bare merknaden som trekker en tilkobling mellom posisjon for merknad og ankerpunktet.

trans-unit.source: This class can also display text and automatically calculate its required size.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan også vise tekst og beregne automatisk den påkrevde størrelsen.

trans-unit.source: Different callout styles are supported.
trans-unit.target: Annen bildeforklaringsstilene støttes.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation position alignment to the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringen for posisjonen til ankerpunktet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> value that represents the alignment of the annotation to the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> verdi som angir justeringen for merknaden fra ankerpunktet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the offset that the X-position of the annotation has from the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir forskyvningen med X-posisjonen for merknaden fra ankerpunktet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation> must be anchored using either the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorX%2A> property, and its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.X%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation>Må være forankret å bruke enten <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorX%2A>egenskapen, og den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.X%2A>egenskapen må være satt til <xref:System.Double.NaN>.</xref:System.Double.NaN> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.X%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorX%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the offset of the annotation's X-position from the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> verdi som angir forskyvningen for X-posisjon for for merknaden fra ankerpunktet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the offset that the Y-position of the annotation has from the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir forskyvningen med Y-posisjonen for merknaden fra ankerpunktet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation> must be anchored using either the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorY%2A> property, and its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.Y%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation>Må være forankret å bruke enten <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorY%2A>egenskapen, og den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.Y%2A>egenskapen må være satt til <xref:System.Double.NaN>.</xref:System.Double.NaN> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.Y%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorY%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the offset of the annotation's Y-position from the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> verdi som angir forskyvningen for Y-posisjon for for merknaden fra ankerpunktet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation type name.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på merknaden.

trans-unit.source: For internal use, should not be used.
trans-unit.target: For intern bruk, kan ikke brukes.

trans-unit.source: For internal use, should not be used.
trans-unit.target: For intern bruk, kan ikke brukes.

trans-unit.source: The annotation type.
trans-unit.target: Merknadstypen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsfargen for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> listeverdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation background gradient style.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den gradering stilen for merknadstekst.

trans-unit.source: Two colors are used to draw the gradient, and are set with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: To farger brukes til å tegne graderingen og er angitt med den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration value used to draw the annotation background.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som brukes til å tegne bakgrunnsfargen for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background hatch style of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skraveringsstilen for bakgrunn for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: Two colors are used to draw the hatching, and are set with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: To farger brukes til å tegne skravering og er angitt med den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> value used to draw the annotation background.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref> verdien brukes til å tegne bakgrunnsfargen for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary color for the annotation background.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den sekundære fargen for bakgrunn for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: This color is used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A> property when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackHatchStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackGradientStyle%2A> properties are used.
trans-unit.target: Denne fargen brukes med den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A>egenskapen når den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackHatchStyle%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackGradientStyle%2A>Egenskaper brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackGradientStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackHatchStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> enumeration value used in conjunction with a primary color to draw the annotation background with hatching or gradient fill.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> opplistingsverdien brukes sammen med en farge som primær til å tegne merknadsbakgrunnen skravering eller gradering fyll.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style for a callout line anchor cap.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stilen for en ankerstykke.

trans-unit.source: The CalloutAnchorCap property sets the style of the anchor cap for the line that connects the annotation with the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CalloutAnchorCap Angir stilen for ankeret forbokstav for linjen som kobler merknaden ankerpunktet.

trans-unit.source: This property is only applicable when a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle> callout style is used.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder bare når en <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle>Bildeforklaringsstil brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle"></xref> enumeration value that represents the style to use for a callout line anchor cap.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som representerer stilen som skal brukes for en ankerstykke.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation callout style.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Bildeforklaringsstil for merknad.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle"> </xref> listeverdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation line color.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir linjefargen for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the annotation line.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdien brukes til å tegne merknadslinjen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation line style.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir linjestil for merknad.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value used to draw the annotation line.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som brukes til å tegne merknadslinjen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line width of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir linjetykkelsen for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the annotation line width, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> verdi som Representer merknad-linjetykkelse i piksler.
